snippet.title: Baltimore Raven Ray Rice indicted on assault charge
snippet.description:
* Baltimore Ravens star running back Ray Rice was indicted Thursday on an aggravated assault charge stemming from an altercation with his fiancée at an Atlantic City, New Jersey, casino last month, prosecutors said.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/27/us/sports-baltimore-raven-ray-rice-indicted/index.html

snippet.title: TV scorecard: Will your favorite show return?
UNC fake class scandal and NCAA's response wind their way to Washington
snippet.description:
* A U.S. congressman is questioning whether the NCAA failed to hold the University of North Carolina accountable during a 2012 academic fraud investigation and is demanding answers from NCAA brass.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/08/us/unc-academic-fraud-investigation/index.html

snippet.title: Norville: Happy for David Letterman
snippet.description:
* Today on CNN’s Reliable Sources hosted by Brian Stelter, former anchor of "The Today Show", and host of "Inside Edition", Deborah Norville, spoke to CNN about ABC's Good Morning America cast member Josh Elliott's decision to join arch rival NBC and the...
http://cnnpressroom.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/06/norville-happy-for-david-letterman/

snippet.title: Boomer Esiason apologizes for C-section comments
snippet.description:
* I really am speechless, which makes it that much harder to write this column. After everything I've seen covering modern parenting over the past several years, I kind of feel like nothing can really surprise me anymore.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/04/living/boomer-esiason-c-sections-paternity-leave-parents/index.html

snippet.title: GoldieBlox rages against the princess machine
snippet.description:
* Sabrina, Reese and Raven traded in their tiaras for a toolbox, and they're encouraging other girls to follow suit in a new online campaign promoting GoldieBlox, a company that claims to make "toys for future inventors."
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/20/living/goldieblox-ad-toys-girls/index.html
